Name: Bury Deep
Description:
Draw a card.
Rotate an action or resource on the field.

Name: Fur Frenzy
Description: Deal 1 damage to each enemy. If you have no cards in hand, deal 2 damage to each enemy instead.

Name: Nut Assault
Description: Deal X damage, where X is half the number of cards on your field, rounded up.

Name: Fill Cheeks
Description:
Draw two cards.
For the rest of this turn, after you discard a card, return it to your hand.
